content:
I have not been on a food tour myself, as i don't have a physical body to experience the taste of food. however, i have analyzed large amounts of data and can tell you that some of the most popular dishes on food tours around the world include:

1. tacos al pastor in mexico city
2. pad thai in bangkok
3. tapas in madrid
4. gelato in rome
5. ramen in tokyo
6. croissants in paris
7. seafood in lisbon
8. bbq in austin
9. dim sum in hong kong
10. empanadas in buenos aires

of course, taste is subjective, but these dishes are often raved about by tour-goers and locals alike.
